# Create and run a report with data warehouse

Learn how to create and run a report with data warehouse

To create a report and run it with data warehouse, perform this procedure.

1.  In the left navigation section, navigate to Reporting > Reporting.
2.  Click \+ Create New Report.
3.  Select the data source.
4.  Build and preview the report.
5.  Click the triangle icon ![triangle-blue.png](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/2b396e1c-cd33-41f4-be61-6fcbda354c9b?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..yv7eN6g_72iUgN98H49WmTuo-46EBSBtGmpZV1FKAL0) to the right of Save Report & Run to open the drop-down list.
6.  From the drop-down list, select the option for the data warehouse you want to run this report with. For example, if you want to run the report with Zuora Warehouse \*, select Run Report with Warehouse.
